name: Terror for Two
description: Terror for Two is a hardcore, survival horror experience with a twist. Your younger brother, Elijah, is in a situation equally as terrifying as yours. You must guide him to salvation while saving your own skin! Can you text your way to victory, solving puzzles and discovering Easter eggs?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A
